title: How to raise frugal kids as you save for early retirement
text:
How to raise frugal kids as you save for early retirement More

Children can become an obstacle on the path to financial independence and early retirement because they’re expensive to raise — unless you raise them to enjoy the journey alongside you. Many parents participating in the FIRE (“financial independence, retire early”) movement are doing just that, by finding low-cost activities, quality hand-me-downs and simple ways to explain money to their kids. Teaching youngsters about mindful spending can be difficult, especially when classmates may have the newest toys or are participating in pricey after-school activities or sports teams, but these parents say they have those lessons down pat.
